sentences.english: Two days later we arrived in Datong, the coal-mining capital of Northern China.
sentences.chinese: 兩天後我們到了大同，中國北方的煤礦之都。

sentences.english: The article introduces the fault structure in the Wajinwan coal mine, summarizes experience of excavating coal through the fault.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了大同煤礦集團公司挖金灣礦斷層構造情況。

sentences.english: The two sides should seek consensus on major issues while reserving differences on minor issues, instead of imposing restrictions or sanctions at every turn.
sentences.chinese: 雙方應求大同存小異，不要動輒設限和制裁。

sentences.english: John and Robert dressed much of a muchness.
sentences.chinese: 約翰和羅伯特穿着大同小異。

sentences.english: China believes that everyone belongs to one family in a united world.
sentences.chinese: 中國人歷來主張“世界大同，天下一家”。

sentences.english: The next year, she became head of the Shaoxing Datong College.
sentences.chinese: 第二年，她成爲紹興大同學院的校長。

sentences.english: Known as the Musician, Fang Datong efforts at making music himself.
sentences.chinese: 被譽爲音樂才子，方大同努力在音樂裏作他自己。

sentences.english: North Koreans stroll along the Taedong River in Pyongyang, North Korea.
sentences.chinese: 朝鮮人在平壤的大同江邊散步。

sentences.english: Hundreds of coal mines are concentrated around the city Datong.
sentences.chinese: 大同市周圍集中着幾百個煤礦。

sentences.english: Micro-structure of coal samples from Datong coal mine and Tunliu coal mine were respectively detected using mercury intrusion method.
sentences.chinese: 採用壓汞法對大同和屯留煤樣進行微結構測試。

sentences.english: Finally, the paper discuss how to improve the city's WRCC.
sentences.chinese: 最後討論了提高大同市水資源承載能力的途徑。

sentences.english: The farmland irrigation of Datong city in the past was mainly depend on surface water irrigation.
sentences.chinese: 大同市以往的農田灌溉，多以地表水灌溉爲主。

sentences.english: Square big money, Please buy his CD.
sentences.chinese: 早日買房，世界大同，我也幾想啊。

sentences.english: This paper explored the emotional intelligence of key senior high school students in Shanghai and Datong, Shanxi province.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究上海市和山西省大同市重點高中生情緒智力。

sentences.english: This is the Nine Dragon Screen of Datong, Shanxi.
sentences.chinese: 這是山西大同的九龍壁。
